subject: VAM Pro Question
description_text:
Hi,

I’d like to order the VAM Pro haptics, but I want to confirm compatibility.
Aside from requiring my own mounting solution, will the haptic system work
with my fanatec pedals/wheelbase?

Would I just use the Simsonn control box for the haptic motors? Any
help/confirmation would be great, and I will place my order once I’m
confident they will work for me.

Thank you!

Cam

conversations.body_text: Hi Cam Kinsman,  It is compatible with Fanatec’s pedal control box, as they use the same connector.

Thanks, what if I want to use your control box independently? With just the
haptics connected to it? This would work too right?

On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 11:35 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Cam Kinsman,  Yes, that’s possible. You only need to use our control box and motor to receive telemetry data and handle vibration feedback. You may need to order the PlusX control box and a 24V power supply, and please specify whether you need a US, EU, or UK plug. The Fanatec control box will still handle the pedal signal output to the game, and the two systems will not interfere with each other.
